#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

long long int T, N;

inline long long int Convert ( long long int Gray )
{
    long long int Result = Gray & 1073741824LL;

    long long int N = 1073741824LL;

    while ( N )
    {
        Result |= ( Gray ^ ( Result >> 1LL ) ) & N;

        N >>= 1LL;
    }

    return Result;
}

int main ( void )
{
    scanf ( "%lld", &T );

    while ( T-- )
    {
        scanf ( "%lld", &N );

        printf ( "%lld\n", Convert ( N ) );
    }
}
